comments: The root 1.1762808182599175065440703384740350... is the smallest known Salem number.
references: Lewin, Structural Properties of Polylogarithms, AMS #37. p. 365, 1991.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-1, 0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 0, -1, -1).
formula: a(n) = -a(n - 1) + a(n - 3) + a(n - 4) + a(n - 5) + a(n - 6) + a(n - 7) - a(n - 9) - a(n - 10). - _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Oct 23 2008
author: _Simon Plouffe_
